title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks resume losses ahead of Big Tech earnings - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks resume losses ahead of Big Tech earnings  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks plunged Tuesday, accelerating April's sell-off after markets briefly retreated from losses to end higher in the previous trading session. Investors are looking ahead to a batch of mega cap tech earnings in the coming days, with reports from Microsoft and Alphabet due out after the bell.
